paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the use of base editing in human pluripotent stem cells to model Long QT Syndrome, focusing on introducing mutations in genes including KCNH2. However, no specific KCNH2 variants are detailed in the text.

challenges: The paper did not provide specific variant details for KCNH2.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper mentions the KCNH2 gene in the context of Long QT Syndrome but does not specify any particular variants or penetrance data.
